attributes.background: As we can see from practice papers being handed to GCSE students, there is A-Level content in the GSCE papers. It is extremely hard for students to be able to do certain topics alongside juggling other subjects. Please consider making the exams easier, with less A-Level content.

rejection.details:
The content of exams is the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

GCSEs, AS levels and A levels are regulated by Ofqual. You can find out more about its work here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/regulating-gcses-as-and-a-levels-guide-for-schools-and-colleges
